title: CLS strict CI artifact uploaded
summary: selfcheck-report uploaded and validated; bridge healthy
author: gg

title: MLS Core Brain Auto-Recording System
summary: Created universal MLS auto-recording system: mls_auto_record.zsh, mls_session_summary.zsh, mls_activity_hook.zsh. Records all activities (todos, pendings, followups, deployments, debugging, learning, failures) to MLS Ledger automatically. This ensures the core brain/memory captures everything - no work is lost.
author: gg

title: MLS Ledger is Primary Memory Layer
summary: Clarified that MLS Ledger (mls/ledger/YYYY-MM-DD.jsonl) is the actual working memory layer. MLS Lessons wasn't being used in reality, so Ledger was created as the 2nd memory layer. Everything must be recorded to LEDGER - this is the real core brain.
author: gg

title: CLS WO Cleanup Bot Created
summary: Created automated Work Order cleanup bot to address stale pending WOs. Bot checks Redis, evidence, MLS ledger, and updates statuses. Scheduled daily at 02:00 via LaunchAgent.
author: gg

title: MLS Not Capturing Training Prompts
summary: User tried to train AI with prompts but MLS system didn't trigger. This is a critical failure - MLS should capture all prompts/conversations automatically, not require manual invocation. Without this, training efforts are lost.
author: gg

title: CLS Session: WO Cleanup Bot & MLS Prompt Capture Gap
summary: 1) Created automated WO cleanup bot to address stale pending WOs. 2) Identified critical MLS failure: training prompts not being captured automatically. 3) Created Work Order and hook script for prompt capture. 4) All 5 stale WOs updated to abandoned status. 5) LaunchAgent scheduled for daily cleanup at 02:00.
author: gg

title: MLS Auto-Prompt Capture Feature Plan Created
summary: Created SPEC.md and PLAN.md for automatic MLS prompt capture. Feature will use file watcher on Cursor SQLite database to automatically capture conversations. Estimated 6-10 hours implementation time.
author: gg

title: MLS Auto-Prompt Capture Code Review Complete
summary: Code review completed for MLS auto-prompt capture feature. Approved with conditions - need to address workspace detection, SQLite schema fallback, and error handling details before implementation.
author: gg

title: MLS Auto-Prompt Capture SPEC/PLAN Updated
summary: Updated SPEC and PLAN based on code review: added workspace detection, Phase 1.5 go/no-go decision, complete error handling spec (3 retries, exponential backoff), fixed data schema consistency (producer: clc), specified state file location, added performance baseline measurement, completed deduplication strategy.
author: gg

title: MLS Auto-Prompt Capture Code Review v2 Complete
summary: Follow-up code review completed. All critical blockers addressed: workspace detection, Phase 1.5 go/no-go decision, error handling spec, data schema consistency, state file location, performance baseline, deduplication strategy. Status upgraded from CONDITIONAL (75%) to FULL APPROVAL (90%). Ready for implementation.
author: gg

title: Phase 1 Investigation: Found Cursor Schema
summary: Discovered Cursor SQLite schema: ItemTable stores composer.composerData with allComposers array. Each composer has metadata (name, createdAt, lastUpdatedAt, composerId) but actual messages/prompts may be stored separately. Need to investigate message storage location.
author: gg

title: Phase 1 Complete: Found Prompts in aiService.prompts
summary: Phase 1 investigation complete. Found aiService.prompts key containing JSON array of all user prompts. Each prompt has 'text' and 'commandType'. Can extract prompts and match to composers via timestamps. Decision: PROCEED with Option A (SQLite watcher).
author: gg

title: Phase 2: MLS Cursor Watcher Implementation Progress
summary: Created mls_cursor_watcher.zsh with extraction, deduplication, and recording logic. Currently debugging JSON parsing issue with control characters. Using base64 encoding to safely pass JSON to Python.
author: gg

title: Fixed Ops Status Board Workflow
summary: Created missing run/generate_ops_status.cjs script for ops-status.yml workflow. Script generates status.html, jobs.json, _health.html, and manifest.json for GitHub Pages deployment.
author: gg

title: MLS Auto-Prompt Capture Phase 2 Complete
summary: Phase 2 implementation complete. Watcher script successfully extracts and records prompts from Cursor SQLite database. Tested with 242 prompts processed. Created LaunchAgent for automatic execution every 5 minutes. All prompts now automatically captured to MLS Ledger.
author: gg

title: Fixed Mirror Integrity Workflow
summary: Created missing run/verify_mirror_integrity.cjs script for mirror-integrity.yml workflow. Script checks 10 URLs, validates SHA256 hashes, monitors latency, and generates alerts for failures.

title: Fixed MLS Cursor Watcher stdin hang issue
summary: Root cause: Using heredoc with pipe caused stdin conflict. Solution: Replaced with python3 -c inline code. Added empty stdin guard. Fixed escape sequence warnings. Verified with dry-run and LaunchAgent restart. Service now running cleanly every 5 minutes.

title: Fixed critical arithmetic bug in adaptive_proposal_gen.zsh
summary: Bug: (( sample_count++ )) caused exit code 1 when incrementing from 0, combined with set -e this terminated script silently. Solution: Changed to sample_count=$((sample_count + 1)) on lines 65 and 69. Added defensive || false to jq -e checks. Result: Script now exits cleanly with proper messages. All Phase 6.2 acceptance tests pass.
